original_text: The Babylonian soldiers came to have sex with her. They did many disgusting things with her so that she was unclean. After they had done this to her, she became upset. She turned away from them.
korean_text: 바벨론 사람이 나아와 연애하는 침상에 올라 음행으로 그를 더럽히매 그가 더럽힘을 입은 후에 그들을 싫어하는 마음이 생겼느니라

sentences.original_text: The Babylonian soldiers came to have sex with her.
sentences.korean_translation: 바빌로니아 군인들이 그녀와 성관계를 하러 왔다.

sentences.original_text: They did many disgusting things with her
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 그녀와 많은 역겨운 일들을 했다

sentences.original_text: After they had done this to her,
sentences.korean_translation: 그들이 그녀에게 이런 일을 한 후에,
